entry.title: JHF managed social health service project

link.title: JHF managed social health service project

entry.content:
I am Md. Saju Ahmed, very happy to inform that the initiative has been taken to manage a special medical service project aimed at the welfare of poor, distressed and destitute humanity.

Specialty

Under this social health care project, the necessary homeopathic treatment services will be provided to each patient within maximum Eighty Taka (lower than $01). In addition to the very poor medical care needy patients and whom are unable to afford medical treatment will be provided free homeopathic treatment.

Objectives

  1. Provide the best homeopathic treatment services to poor, destitute people in low cost or within one’s affordable cost.
  2. Providing free treatment to the very poor patients and ensuring easy access to the necessary medicines and care.
  3. According to homeopathic, appropriate information and ideas about different diseases will be given. Provide information on disease prevention and remediation measures.
  4. Provide post-medical health care and counseling.
  5. Arrangement for the medical information about patients who need long-term treatment.
  6. From the beginning to the end of the treatment, check each patient properly.

The place and time to provide medical services.

Jannat Homeo Clinic
Shital Plaza, Aldi Bazar, Tongibari, Munshiganj.
Mobile: +8801865-738180.

Time to visit the patient:
Every Sunday and Wednesday from 10 AM to 01 PM and 03 PM to 05 PM.

SSD Powered Wordpress Hosting
For Unlimited Speed & Growth
AI Powered Security, 30 Days Money Back
24x7 Online Help Desk, 99.99% Uptime

Find Us Here:

entry.title: Welcome to Jannat Homeo .Org
entry.content:
This is Dr. Md. Saju Ahmed. I am a Homeopathic consultant and general practitioner.

My Mission:

The physician’s high and only mission is to restore the sick to health, to cure, as it is termed.

Samuel Hahnemann, The Organon of Medicine, Aphorism 1.

My Goals:

  • To provide on-line consultation / treatment.
  • To provide awareness of the disease, disease process and its prevention and management techniques.
  • To provide first aid information with homoeopathic remedies and illustrations to enable persons to provide help in emergency situations.
  • To provide documented cases with clinical test reports as well as homoeopathic remedies used during the course of treatment, to prove the efficacy of homoeopathic system of medicine.
  • To provide new research papers in homoeopathy by eminent homoeopaths.

My clinic and services:

Chamber -1:

Jannat Homoeo Clinic

Sheetal Plaza, Aldi Bazar, Munshiganj, Bangladesh.

Services:

Here you can treat these diseases listed below:

  1. Respiratory Tract Infections (RTI’s).
  2. Skin Diseases.
  3. Gastrointestinal Diseases.
  4. Gynecological Diseases.

Read More …

Chamber -2:

Shaheen Homoeo Hall
Shop No. - 11, Super Market, Munshiganj, Bangladesh.

Services:

Shaheen Homoeo Hall is one of my specialized chamber for the treatment of deep seated diseases like Brain Tumor, Antibiotic Resistant Tuberculosis, Psoriasis, Vitiligo, PCOD, Asthma, Alopecia, Sexual Transmitted Disease, Fibroids, Breast Tumor, Cancerous and Non-Cancerous Tumor, etc.

For Quick Contact:

Dr. S. Ahmed Rahiq
Mobile: +8801865-738180

Domain and Web Hosting in BD

SSD Shared Web Hosting Plan
from USA & Bangladesh Data Center. 24x7 Help Desk

entry.title: Case Taking Form
entry.content:
Case taking form for online consultation.

These questions are designed to get the following information from the patient,

  1. Mental State of the patient.
  2. Physical Ailments.
  3. The likely cause for above problems.
  4. The modalities like whether the patient feels well or worse in hot weather, cold weather etc., he is relieved by / worsened by hot applications, cold applications etc.

Patients can use this questionnaire for submitting their cases. The effectiveness of remedy selection is directly proportional to the details provided by the patient while replying these questions.

General Information:

Patient Name:

------------

Age:

------------

Contact (Phone or Mobile) Number:

------------

E-mail Address (If you have):

------------

Full Address:

------------

1. Describe your main suffering?

------------

2. What other physical sufferings do you have in your body?

------------

3. What mental sufferings / feelings do you have associated with your physical sufferings?

------------

4. What exactly do you feel when you are at your worst?

------------

5. When did it all start? Can you connect it to any past event or disease?

------------

6. Which time of the day you are worst?

------------

7. What are the things which aggravate your suffering and which are those which ameliorate the same?

------------

8. Do your think your sufferings have relation to any external stimuli (like, change of place) or any internal biological changes in the body, like, menses (in females)?

------------

9. When do you feel better, during hot weather or cold weather, humid or dry weather?

------------

10. Describe your general mental set up? Are you Moody, Arrogant, Mild, Agreeable Changeable, Nervous, Suspicious, Easily offended, Quiet, Arguing, Irritating, Lazy etc.

------------

- How do you feel before or during a thunderstorm?

------------

- Do you like being consoled during your tough times?

------------

- Are you sensitive to external stimuli like smell, noise, light etc?

------------

- Do you have any typical habit or gesture like nail biting, causeless weeping, talking to one self etc?

------------

- How do you feel about your friends, family, your children and especially your husband / wife?

------------

11. What are your fears and do you dream of any situation repeatedly?

------------

12. What do you crave for in food items and what are your aversions?

------------

13. How is your thirst: Less, Normal or Excessive?

------------

14. How if your hunger: Less, Normal or Excessive?

------------

15. Is there any kind of food which your body can’t stand?

------------

16. Is your sweat normal or less or more? Where does it sweat more: Head, Trunk or Limbs?

------------

17. How is your bowel movement and stool type?

------------

18. How well do you sleep? Do you have a particular posture of sleeping?

------------

19. Do you think you are able to satisfy your sexual desires in general?

------------

20. How do you think you are different from others, if at all?

------------

21. What medications have been taken earlier by you to treat the diseases and do you have any particular symptom surfacing after the medication?

------------

22. What major diseases are running in your family?

------------

23. Describe, how do you look like? Describe your overall appearance.

------------

24. (ONLY FOR FEMALES)

Please answer the following questions; (Please give details of your past menstruation if you have attained menopause).

- Are the periods early, regular or late in general? How long do they last?

------------

- Do you suffer from any kind of physical or mental discomfort before, during or after the periods?

------------

- Is the flow scanty, normal or excessive?

------------

- Is the blood thick bright red or pale watery?

------------

- Do you notice any clots in the flow?

------------

Download Case Taking Form (Word Format).

Download Case Taking Form (PDF Format).
entry.summary: Case taking form for online consultation.
